93050.「おお 我がドルワームの恩人 <pc>よ！\n 待っておったぞ。ささ こちらに。:
Oh, if it isn't Dolworm's benefactor,
<pc>! I have been waiting. Please
come here.

93051.「ヴェリナード王国での そなたの活躍は\n こちらにも 届いておる。\n 見事な:
I have heard of your exploits in Verinard. I
hear you did a splendid job.

93052.「ヴェリナードに現れた 王族を狙う不審な男が \n ドルワームに 潜伏しているこ:
I've also heard of a suspicious man who is
targeting royalty has come here... Ramiza
is currently under heavy protection.

93053.「そなたには もうひとりの王家の血を引く者……\n チリの護衛を お願いしたいの:
I'll need you to protect Chiri, as she is
royalty too. Well, will you help me?<yesno><close>

93054.「そんなこと 言うなんてつれないのね。\n 私からもお願い！ ねっ <pc>！？:
Come on, don't be like that. I'm even asking
you too! Well, <pc>?

93055.「……どうじゃ？\n チリの護衛 引き受けてくれんか？<yesno><close: Well? Will you protect Chiri for me?<yesno><close>

93056.「うむ。礼を言うぞ <pc>。\n くれぐれも よろしく頼む。:
Good. Many thanks, <pc>.
I will leave her in your care.

93057.「ありがとう <pc>。\n 迷惑かけちゃうけど……\n しばらくの間 どうか:
Thanks, <pc>! I realize it's a
pain, but... please just bear with me!

93058.「ときに ドゥラよ。\n 護衛を厳重にする以外の対策は\n 何か みつかったのか:
So, Dura. Have you found any other methods
other than just strengthening our guard?

93060.「なんじゃ？\n お前にしては 珍しく弱気な顔ではないか。\n 申してみよ。:
What's wrong? You don't look like your usual
self. Please tell me.

93061.「……我が研究院で 探知機を作成しました。\n 探知機と対になった発信機を 身に:
The institute has created a radar. By wearing
a tracking device that's paired with it, you
can track a person's whereabouts.

93062.「これで 万が一 ラミザ王子らの身に\n 何かあっても 行方を追跡することができ:
This way, if anything should happen to say,
Prince Ramiza, we can track him down.

93063.「すごいや！ さすが ドゥラくんだ！\n うんうん。護衛と探知機……\n これで:
That's great! I never doubted you for a
second, Dura! With our guard here and the
radar, we should be all set!

93064.「……探知機は 完成したのです。 \n しかし 肝心の発信機の出力が弱く\n 近:
The radar is complete. However, the tracking
device is quite weak, so it can only track at
a short range...

93065.「遠方まで 追跡可能にするためには\n ガテリア式真空管という 古代ガテリアに伝:
In order for it to track from much farther
distances, a special part from ancient Gateria
called a Gateria Vacuum Tube is needed...

93066.「現代では 入手が極めて困難なのです。\n このままでは せっかくの探知機も\n:
It's extremely hard to find these days. If we
don't get it, the radar won't be of any use...

93067.「そ そんな……！\n 名案だと思ったのに……。:
No way... and it seemed like such a good
idea, too...

93068.「ガテリア式真空管……\n ……知ってる。それなら 前に\n お父さんのガラクタ:
Gateria Vacuum Tube... I know what that is.
I've seen it before in my dad's junk.

93069.「それは本当ですか チリ王女！？: You've really seen one, Princess Chiri?!

93070.「ドゥラ院長。\n 王女はやめてと 何度も言ったでしょう？:
Hey, Dura... how many times have I told you
not to call me "princess"?

93071.「何度言われても チリ様は王女。\n それは 変わりありません。:
Well, no matter how many times you say
that, you'll always be a princess.

93072.「……そんなことより\n ガテリア式真空管の持ち主というのは\n チリ王女を 育:
...But more importantly, you're saying the
man who raised you owns a Gateria Vacuum
Tube?

93073.「ええ。父は 岳都ガタラに住んでいます。\n ガラクタが大好きで いつも\n 珍:
Yes. My father lives in Mount Gatara. He
adores junk and spends his time collecting all
kinds of weird things.

93074.「では さっそく\n その方の所まで向かう準備を……。: Then, we must go to him immediately...

93076.「あの お父さんのことだもの。\n 自分の宝物を そう簡単に渡すわけない。\n:
My father... he's not one to just give away
his treasure so easily. That's why
I'm coming with you!

93077.「いいですよね 国王様？\n 父は なんというか…… たいへんな変わり者で\n:
Is that okay, your Majesty? My father is quite
an... eccentric man, so I'm sure I'm the
only one able to convince him!

93078.「ご自分の立場を わかっているのですか！？\n 道中 何者かに狙われでもしたら…:
Don't you realize the danger you're in?! What
if something were to happen to you on the
way there...?

93079.「そのための <pc>の護衛なんでしょう？ \n ドルワームの英雄 <pc>に\:
Isn't that why <pc>'s escorting
me? Surely we'll be fine if Dolworm's hero
comes along with us!

93080.「……やむを得んだろう。\n ただし！ 現状で目立つのは 避けたい。\n この任:
We have no choice... However, you must not
draw attention to yourself. This mission shall
be executed with a small group.

93081.「チリの養父のもとへ向かうのは\n チリとドゥラ そして<pc>のみじゃ。\n:
Only Chiri, Dura, and <pc>
may go. Is that clear?

93082.「ありがとうございます 国王様。\n 必ず ガテリア式真空管を持ちかえってきます:
Thank you, your Majesty. I'll be sure to bring
back the vacuum tube we need.

93083.「うう…… こんな時にボクだけ\n 何もできないなんて 申し訳ないけど……。\n:
*sigh* I feel bad that I'm of no help at a
time like this, but...please be careful, all
of you.

93084.「それじゃ よろしくね <pc>！\n <pc>が 先導してくれたら\n 私たち:
Well then, I'll leave it to you,
<pc>! Lead the way and we'll follow.

93085.「３人で お父さんのいる 岳都ガタラへ\n 向かいましょう！:
The three of us will head to Gatara to see
my father!

93086.「あっ！ 元ポツコン２号さんじゃないですか！\n それに チリさんまで！！\n:
Ah! It's Ex-Junkey #2! And Chiri, too!
Long time no see, Chiri...<heart>

93087.「ひさしぶりだね ポツコン。\n お父さんはいる？: It's been a while, Junkey. Is my dad around?

93089.「ダストンさま ダストンさま～！\n チリさんが いらしてますよ。:
Mr. Duston! Mr. Duston! Chiri is here to
see you!

93091.「むきゃーー！！ もきぃーーー！！\n アンタってヤツは まったく\n あぎゃぎ:
RRRRGHH!! RRRGAHHH!! You really are such an...
UGH!!!

93092.「ああ ごめん ごめん。\n しばらく 顔も出さずにいて。: Yeah, sorry, sorry. I know it's been a while.

93095.「え？ 今 なんて言いました……？\n チリ…… 王女……？:
Huh? What did you just say...?
Princess... Chiri...?

93096.「えええええええっ！？ \n まさか チリさんの本当の親って……\n ドルワーム:
Whaaaaaaaaaaaaaat?! Don't tell me... Chiri's
real parent... is the king of Dolworm?!?

93097.「へー アンタ 王女だったんですか。\n 王女なのに 捨てられちまうなんて\n:
Huh, so you're a princess? You must've been a
pretty worthless princess to just be thrown
out like that.

93098.「チリさんと一緒にいる 身なりのキレイな\n いかにも優秀そうな男……。\n ま:
This very well dressed and capable looking
man... c... could it be...? Chiri will
introduce us to her lover...?!

93099.「はじめまして。ドルワーム王立研究院で \n 院長をつとめている ドゥラと申しま:
It's a pleasure to meet you. My name is Dura,
Director of the Royal Institute of Dolworm.
I came here today to see you, Mr. Duston.

93100.「あぎゃばっ！ い…院長……？\n わしは そんな優秀そうなヤツは苦手ですよッ！:
Waah! D...Director...?! I don't do so well
with such competent looking people!

93101.「ごめんなさい。父に 悪気はないんです。\n どうか 気を悪くしないでください。:
Sorry about that. My father means well. Please
don't let him offend you.

93102.「あのね お父さん。今 アストルティア中の \n 王族が狙われるという事件が 発:
Dad, listen. Royalty all over Astoltia are
being targeted, and we don't know who they
are or what they want. But...

93103.「ドゥラ院長は 私やラミザ王子がさらわれても\n すぐに 居場所がわかっちゃう\:
Dura here is working on an amazing tracking
device that can immediately locate me or
Prince Ramiza if we are kidnapped.

93104.「ただ……そのためには ガテリア式真空管という\n 古代の部品が必要なんです。あ:
But... in order to do that, we need an ancient
part called a Gateria Vacuum Tube. Do you
think you could help us out?

93105.「ガテリア式真空管……？\n そんなもの 知らねえですよッ？: Gateria Vacuum Tube...? What the heck is that?

93106.「ああ ほら！ ダストンさま……！\n 前に ここを訪れた考古学者が\n すごく:
Oh, hey! Mr. Duston! That archaeologist who
visited here before said it was pretty
valuable...

93107.「ああ！ そんなもの もう とっくに\n カルデア洞穴の ふかーい所に\n 捨て:
Ah, yeah! I threw that thing away ages ago
way, way deep in the Chaldea Cave!

93108.「な…なんだって……！？\n あんな貴重なものを……。:
W...what?! To throw away such a valuable
item...

93109.「大丈夫！ あきらめるには まだ早いわ！\n 私に 考えがあるの。:
Don't worry! Don't give up just yet! I've got
a plan.

93110.「ねえ お父さん。\n それを 捨てた場所まで行って\n もう一度 ここに持って:
Hey, dad. Do you think you can go back and
get what you threw away?

93111.「な…なんで わしが！ \n そんなことするわけねえですよッ！\n あんな貴重な:
W...why me?! I'd never do something like
that! I don't care about that precious
thing anymore!

93112.「じつは 私ね。お父さんが喜びそうなガラクタを\n たくさん集めて ドルワームに:
You know, I've been collecting a lot of junk I
think you'd like and have been storing it in
Dolworm. You can have as much as you want!

93115.「しょ しょうがねえですねッ！\n 言っておきますが ガラクタのためであって\n:
I... I have no choice! This is for the junk!
Not you! I mean it!

93116.「うんうん わかってる。\n ありがとう お父さん！: Yeah, yeah, I know. Thanks, dad!

93117.「そうと決まれば ひとっ走り行ってくるですよ！\n ここで 待ってやがるがいいで:
Now that that's decided, I'm off! Wait for me
here 'til I get back!

93118.「とは言え……。あの お父さんが寄り道せず \n ちゃんと目的を果たせるか 心配:
Although... I am worried if he'll be able to
go and get it without getting distracted...
I'd go and follow him, but...

93119.「ねえ <pc>。\n 私の代わりに お父さんの後をついていって\n 様子を 見:
Hey, <pc>. Would you mind
following behind my dad just to make
sure he stays on track?

93120.「チリ王女は 私が責任をもって守ります。\n 我々は ここで待っていますので\n:
While you're off doing that, we will stay here
and I will take responsibility for protecting
Princess Chiri.

93121.「お父さんが向かった カルデア洞穴へは \n ガタラを出て 北東に進むと たどり:
You can get to Chaldea Cave by leaving Gatara
and then heading northeast. We're counting
on you!

93122.「ああっ 元ポツコン２号さん。\n ダストンさまなら カルデア洞穴へ\n 向かわ:
Ah, Ex-Junkey #2. Mr. Duston is on his
way to the Chaldea Cave as we speak.

93123.「高性能発信機を 完成させるためには\n ダストン氏に ガテリア式真空管を\n:
In order to complete the tracking device, we
need Mr. Duston to bring back that Gateria
Vacuum Tube.

93124.「とは言え……あの お父さんが寄り道せず \n ちゃんと 目的を果たせるか心配ね:
Although... I am worried if he'll be able to
go and get it without getting distracted...
I'd go and follow him, but...

93125.「ねえ <pc>。\n 私の代わりに お父さんの後をついていって\n 様子を 見:
Hey, <pc>. Would you mind
following behind my dad just to make
sure he stays on track?

93126.「お父さんが向かった カルデア洞穴へは \n ガタラを出て 北東に進むと たどり:
You can get to Chaldea Cave by leaving Gatara
and then heading northeast. He's probably in
the deepest part of the cave.

93127.「チリ王女は 私が責任をもって守ります。\n 我々は ここで待っていますので\n:
While you're off doing that, we will stay here
and I will take responsibility for protecting
Princess Chiri.

93128.「どうやら お父さんも あなたのことは\n 気に入ってるみたいだしね。\n 頼ん:
It seems my father also likes you, too.
We're counting on you!

93129.「たしか この辺りから\n ブン投げたんでしたっけ？: I know it's gotta be around here somewhere...

93130.「おお みつけたですよッ！\n あんなところに 引っかかってるなんて\n なかな:
Oh, found it! Pretty amazing it got stuck
there, of all places. Almost looked right
past it!

93131.「おや アンタも来たんですか？\n こんな場所にまで わざわざ来るなんて\n よ:
Oh, you came too? You must've been pretty
bored if you came all the way here.

93132.「まあ そんなことはいいです。\n せっかく アンタも来たなら……: Well, whatever. Anyways, while you're here...

93133.「わしが 今から あぎゃぎゃってするので\n アンタは そこに ただボーッと\n:
I'm gonna go ahead and do my thing, so just
sit back and do whatever!

93135.「こ…こんな役に立つもの \n わしは 持ちたくねえんですッ！\n これは アン:
I...I don't want this useful thing! Here, you
take it!

93136.<pc>は\nガテリア式真空管（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Gateria Vacuum Tube (Key Item)!<me 60>

93137.「ぐぎゃぎゃぎゃッ！\n これで ドルワームのガラクタは\n ぜーんぶ わしのも:
Tee hee hee! Soon, all of Dolworm's junk will
be aaaaaall mine!

93138.「そうと決まれば こんな場所とは \n 一刻も早く オサラバですよッ！:
If we're all good, then let's get the heck
out of here!

93139.「おかえりなさい！\n ダストンさま 元ポツコン２号さん。: Welcome back, Mr. Duston! And Ex-Junkey #2!

93140.「ガテリア式真空管 持ちかえってくれたんだね。\n ありがとう！！:
I see you've brought back the vacuum tube!
Thanks a bunch!

93141.「ガラクタをくれるって約束…… \n 忘れてねえでしょうね？:
You promised there'd be junk for me... You
didn't forget, right?

93142.「うんうん だいじょーぶだよっ！\n 抱えきれないほどの ガラクタをあげるから\:
Yeah, yeah, don't worry! I'll give you more
junk than you know what to do with!

93143.「せっかく 材料もそろったのですし\n ここで 発信機を完成させましょう。\n:
Now that we've got all the needed materials,
I can complete the tracking device. The
vacuum tube, if you would.

93144.<pc>は ドゥラ院長に\nガテリア式真空管を 渡した！:
<pc> gave Director Dura the
Gateria Vacuum Tube!

93145.「すぐに 作業を開始できるよう\n 準備をしておいたんです。\n 完成まで 少々:
I've already prepared everything, so I can
begin work right away. Please give me a few
moments to complete it.

93146.ドゥラ院長は ガテリア式真空管を使って\nあっという間に 高性能発信機を 完成さ:
Director Dura used the Gateria Vacuum Tube
to create a high-performance tracking device
in no time flat!

93147.「これが 発信機……？\n ……きれい。:
So this is the tracking device...? It's
pretty.

93148.「感度は 良好。動作も問題ありません。 \n 成功です！ \n これを 国王とラ:
The reception's good... no problems with
operation, either. Success! We must deliver
this to the King and Prince Ramiza!

93149.「我々は ドルワームに戻ります。\n お世話になりました。\n こちらには 後日:
We will return to Dolworm. Thank you for your
assistance. We'll have a reward delivered to
you in the near future.

93150.「……届ける？ 何言ってやがるんですか？ \n わしも ドルワームへ行きますよッ:
Deliver...? What do you mean? I'm coming to
Dolworm too!

93152.「本気に決まってますよッ！ チリやアンタらの\n 見つくろいなんて 信用できねえ:
Of course I'm serious! I don't trust either
of you! I'll choose junk with my own eyes!

93153.「ポツコン！ わしが留守の間に ガラクタが\n 盗まれたりしないよう しっかりと:
Junkey! Make sure the doors stay shut tight
so none of my junk gets stolen while I'm
gone! Got it?

93154.「は…はい～。\n わかりました ダストンさま！\n 気をつけて いってらっしゃ:
Y...yes. Understood, Mr. Duston! Please have
a safe journey.

93155.「……どうするんです チリ王女？ \n 本当に ダストン氏も\n 連れていくおつ:
What should we do, Princess Chiri...? Is it
really okay for Mr. Duston to come along with
us?

93156.「うーん。こうなった お父さんを\n 説得するのは 骨が折れそうだし……。\n:
Hmmm. Well, it'd take too much effort to
persuade him otherwise... oh, well.

93157.「わかりました。では ドルワームへは\n 列車で 戻ることにしましょう。\n じ:
I understand. In that case, we'll take the
train back to Dolworm. In fact, I've made
special arrangements.

93158.「<pc>さん。準備ができたら\n ガタラの駅へ 向かってくれませんか？\n そ:
When you're ready, could you please head to
Gatara's station? Binobi there will get you
situated.

93159.「我々も すぐに後を追いますので\n ビノービのもとで 合流しましょう。: We'll be right behind you and meet you there.

93182.「ドゥラ院長が作ってくれた 高性能発信機を\n 国王様とラミザ王子にも 届けるた:
I need to go back to Dolworm and give the
tracking devices to the King and Ramiza as
well, but...

93183.「ガラクタを もらい受けるために \n わしは ドルワームへ出発するんですッ。\:
I'm coming to Dolworm so I can get my junk!
I'm definitely going with you!

93184.「……というわけなので お父さんも一緒に\n ドルワームに 連れていくことにする: ...so I'll take my dad to Dolworm.

93185.「わかりました。では ドルワームへは\n 列車で 戻ることにしましょう。\n じ:
I understand. In that case, we'll take the
train back to Dolworm. In fact, I've made
special arrangements.

93186.「<pc>さん。準備ができたら\n ガタラの駅へ 向かってくれませんか？\n そ:
When you're ready, could you please head to
Gatara's station? Binobi there will get you
situated.

93187.「我々も すぐに後を追いますので\n ビノービのもとで 合流しましょう。: We'll be right behind you and meet you there.

93189.「ドゥラ院長が作ってくれた 高性能発信機を\n 国王様とラミザ王子にも 届けるた:
I need to go back to Dolworm and give the
tracking devices to the King and Ramiza as
well, but...

93190.「あーんなヤツに やられちまうなんて\n <pc> アンタは\n リッパな ポン:
I can't believe you let a guy like that do
you in! You really are worthless junk,
<pc>!

93191.「とは言え わしは ガラクタをもらいに行くのを\n あきらめたわけじゃねえですよ:
But that doesn't mean I've given up on getting
my well deserved junk! I'm still coming with
you!

93192.「……と言ってるので お父さんも一緒に\n ドルワームに 連れていくことにするね: ...so I suppose I'll take my dad to Dolworm.

93193.「わかりました。では ドルワームへは\n 列車で 戻ることにしましょう。\n 同:
I understand. In that case, we'll take the
train back to Dolworm. As before, I've made
special arrangements.

93194.「また 列車を使って大丈夫かな。\n もし また襲われたりしたらって考えると\n:
I wonder if it's safe to take the train
again... maybe we should try a different
route...?

93195.「いや 大丈夫でしょう。敵も\n 我々が同じルートを使うとは 思いますまい。\n:
No, it should be fine. I don't think our enemy
will use the same route as before. We
should be fine to use the train again.

93196.「わかったわ！\n それじゃ ドルワームへは\n ドゥラ院長が 手配してくれた列:
Okay! Let's take the special train back to
Dolworm, then.

93197.「<pc>さん。準備ができたら\n ガタラの駅へ 向かってくれませんか？\n そ:
When you're ready, could you please head to
Gatara's station? Binobi there will get you
situated.

93198.「我々も すぐに後を追いますので\n ビノービのもとで 合流しましょう。: We'll be right behind you and meet you there.

93199.「こちらが 特別便の列車です。\n どうぞ 中へ お入りください！:
This is the special train we've prepared.
Please, come aboard!

93201.「さあ 私たちも 乗り込みましょう。: Come on, let's get on board.

93202.「ムキーッ モキーッ！\n まだ ドルワームには着かねえんですかッ？: Rrrrrghh! Grrrrrggh! Are we there yet?

93203.「……お父さんってば\n そんな あせらなくたって\n ガラクタは 逃げたりしな:
Dad, just be patient... that junk isn't going
anywhere.

93204.「これから ドルワームのガラクタを\n もらい受けることを考えると ワクワクして:
The thought of Dolworm's junk has me all
giddy... I can't sit still!

93207.「貴様っ！ \n さては アストルティア中の王族を狙うという\n 不届き者だなっ:
You! You're the one who is after Astoltia's
royalty, aren't you?!

93208.「……どうやら この中にいるのは\n 間違いないようだな。: It seems that the one I seek is among you...

93209.「……くっ。私は 王女を守りますので\n <cs_pchero>さんは ヤツの相:
This isn't good...I will protect the princess!
<cs_pchero>, please deal with him!

93210.「ん……？\n お前は たしか……\n ヴェリナードでも……？:
Hmmm...? Aren't you... the one from
Verinard...?

93211.「まあ いい……。\n 任務遂行のジャマをする者は 排除するのみ。:
Well, no matter... I will dispose of anyone
who gets in the way of our mission.

93212.「ムキーッ モキーッ！\n まだ ドルワームに着いてねえなんて\n 信じられねえ:
Rrrrrgghhh! Grrrrrrgh! I can't believe we're
not there yet!

93213.「うん……。今度こそ 無事に\n ドルワームまで 戻れるといいんだけど……。:
Yeah... Hopefully this time we can make it to
Dolworm in one piece, but...

93215.「またも この列車を狙ってくるなんてっ！\n 次も 同じルートで来ると予測したの:
You came after this train again?! Did you
really predict we'd use the same route?!

93216.「……やはり この中にいるのは\n 間違いないようだな。:
As I thought, there's no mistake that the one
I seek is among you.

93217.「……くっ。私は 王女を守りますので\n <cs_pchero>さんは ヤツの相:
This isn't good...I will protect the princess!
<cs_pchero>, please deal with him!

93218.「任務遂行のジャマをする者は \n 何者であれ 排除するのみ。:
It matters not who... anyone who gets in our
way shall be eliminated.

93219.「チッ。 \n だが…… 狙いさえ果たせれば……。:
Tch. Whatever... as long as I get what I
came here for...

93220.「この男ではなかったか……。\n ならば……！: If not this man, then it must be...!

93226.「……くっ。間もなく ドルワームです。\n 駅で列車を降りたら すぐ\n 発信機:
Rrgh... we will be in Dolworm shortly. As
soon as we get off the train, we must locate
the tracking device.

93228.「ここは ダラズ採掘場のダラリア砂岩遺跡です。\n この場所は 最近になって調査:
That's the Daleria Sandstone Ruins located in
the Daraz Quarry. It's recently been surveyed
and we were allowed to go inside...

93229.「なるほど。確かに ここなら ひと気もない。\n 身を隠すには うってつけという:
I see... there's no people in that area, so
it's the perfect place to hide.

93230.「……を モキィーして ムキャーするなんてッ！ \n 許せねえですッ！\n わし:
...Rrrrrrrrgggghhhh! How could you?! I'm going
to those ruins right now!!

93231.「我々も チリ王女を救うため\n ダラリア砂岩遺跡に向かいましょう。:
We should head there as well so we can rescue
Princess Chiri.

93232.「私は 兵を率いて 追いかけます。\n <cs_pchero>さんは ダストン氏:
I'll have our cavalry head there after
him. In the meantime, could you follow Mr.
Duston to the ruins?

93233.「ダラリア砂岩遺跡は カルデア山道から\n ダラズ採掘場に入ると その西部にあり:
To get there, go to the western area of the
Daraz Quarry from the Chaldea Mountain Road.
I'm counting on you, <cs_pchero>!

93234.「<pc>さん。お待ちしておりましたよ。\n さあ どうぞ こちらへ。\n ウラ:
We've been expecting you. Please come this
way, King Woolard has something to discuss
with you.

93235.「我がドルワームの恩人 <pc>よ。\n チリを救ってくれたこと 心から礼を言う:
To <pc>, Dolworm's benefactor!
I thank you from the bottom of my heart for
rescuing Chiri!

93236.「本当に ありがとう <pc>！\n また 助けられちゃったね。:
Thanks a lot, <pc>! You saved
me yet again.

93237.「賊が 狙っていた人物は チリではなく\n チリの養父ダストン氏であったことも:
I was also told that the kidnapper is not
targeting Chiri, but Duston instead... that
was definitely shocking news...

93238.「ダストン氏には 厳重な警護をつけておる。\n ご本人には 不満もあるようだが…:
Duston is now under heavy protection. I
realize it's upsetting to him, but... you
can see him later.

93239.「お父さんは 自分が 重要人物扱いされることに\n ショックを受けてるみたいだけ:
He must be pretty shocked to be treated like
such an important person, but... the important
thing is he's safe.

93240.「それから……\n ドゥラが考案した 高性能発信機で\n その後の敵の足取りも:
Now then... with that tracking device that
Dura developed, we are able to track the
enemy's movements.

93241.「ウラード国王。\n それは 私から お話ししましょう。: Please let me explain, King Woolard.

93242.「チリ王女が 誘拐犯に投げつけた発信機は\n 現在 エルトナ大陸の\n 世界樹の:
We've confirmed that the tracking device's
current location is now Yggdrahill on the
Eltona continent.

93243.「発信機の動向を見る限り すぐに\n ドルワームに戻ってくることは なさそうです:
Based on its movements, I don't think he'll be
coming back here anytime soon, so I think we
are safe for now. That being said...

93244.「ヤツが危険なことに 変わりありません。\n 誘拐犯の狙いは 王族では ないよう:
He still remains at large. It seems his
targets are not royalty, but I will still
notify the other kingdoms.

93245.「<pc>は このまま 誘拐犯の後を\n 追うんだよね？ 誘拐犯をつかまえて\n:
You're going after that kidnapper, aren't
you? We're all rooting for you to get to the
bottom of this!

93246.「チリや ドルワームを救ってくださった\n <pc>さんなら きっと\n 成しと:
You saved both Chiri and Dolworm, so I have
no doubt you can do it!

93247.「何か 助けが必要な時は いつでも\n このドルワームを 頼るがよい。\n そな:
If you ever need any help, please know you can
always come here. I will do everything in my
power to help you.

93248.「それから…… ささやかじゃが\n これは わが娘を 危機から\n 救ってくれた:
Right... I'd also like to give you this token
of my appreciation for saving my daughter.
Please take it!

93252.「一刻も早く 賊がつかまり\n アストルティアの未来に 明るい太陽の光が\n 降:
May that kidnapper be caught as soon as
possible and the sun shine brightly on the
future of Astoltia!

93254.「列車の中で この女に反応していたのは \n 間違いないはず……。\n なぜ 急:
There is no doubt there was a response to this
woman from the train... why does it not
respond now...?

93256.「ぜーっ ぜーっ……！ \n モキィーして ムキャーするなんてッ\n 許せねえで:
You, you...! You've really ticked me off!
I won't let you get away with this!

93257.「そいつは とーっても\n 役に立たねえ娘なんですッ！\n だから 返してもらい:
She's such a useless girl! That's why I've
come to save her!!

93258.「何を わけのわからぬことを……。: What are you blabbering about now...?

93259.「ん……？ \n なぜ 急に反応しだした……？: What...? Why have you now started to react...?

93260.「まだ これからだというのに 不調か……。 \n ……このクズが！！:
I've only started and it's already failing on
me... what garbage!

93262.「そのヘビは ポンコツなんですね。\n ポンコツヘビを わしにも見せてくだせえ。:
That snake is junk, right? Please let me see
it. I'll bring it back with me!

93264.「そうか…… そうだったのか。\n ……お前こそが 器だったのだな！！:
I see... I see it now. It's you! You are the
vessel!!

93270.「……何度 むらがってこようと\n コバエには 何もできはしない。\n 器は い:
No matter how many times I swat this annoying
fly away, it keeps buzzing back. I shall take
that vessel!

93271.「……ほう。\n 黄牛鬼までも 討ちやぶったか……。:
Impressive... you managed to defeat this
demon as well...

93275.「うん 大丈夫だよ。\n 少しの間 気を失ってただけ。:
Yeah, I'm fine. I just passed out for a little
while, that's all.

93276.「本当は 途中から目が覚めていたんだけど……\n 何か 誘拐犯の情報をつかめない:
Actually, I was half awake...but I faked
being passed out to see if I could get any
more information on that kidnapper.

93277.「でも ダメ。\n さすがに シッポをつかませるような情報は\n 得られなかった:
No good, though... I couldn't get anything
that would've given us a good lead.

93278.「それで とっさに 発信機を投げつけることを \n 思いついたんだけど\n なん:
That's when I had the idea to throw the
tracking device at him! Looks like it ended up
working!

93279.「なるほど。急に チリ王女が\n 起き上がった時は おどろきましたが……\n こ:
I see... it did surprise me when you suddenly
got up from being passed out... but now we
can follow him!

93280.「フン！\n わしは アンタのこと\n そんな優秀に育てた覚えは ねえですよッ！:
Hmph! I don't recall raising you to be so
competent!

93281.「それに比べて アンタってヤツは…… \n 元ポツコン２号が ぜーんぶ片付けちま:
You, on the other hand... you come in here
with your soldiers after Ex-Junkey #2 has
already cleaned up this mess...

93282.「どんな優秀なヤツかと 思ってましたが \n アンタも 院長とは名ばかりの\n:
I thought you were some brilliant guy, but
you're no Director. You're just a splendid
piece of junk!

93284.「ま まあ。それは ともかく…… \n 誘拐犯の 足取りのほかに\n もうひとつ:
Well, whatever... besides tracking the
kidnapper, I found out one more thing!

93285.「それは…… 敵の狙いは \n 私ではなく お父さんだったということ。\n 誘拐:
That is... he's not after me, but you
instead. Is the kidnapper not targeting
royalty after all...?

93286.「もう！ ドゥラ院長ったら！\n いつまで ショックを受けてるの！？\n このこ:
Hey, Dura! How long are you gonna mope around?
Let's hurry and tell the King about all of
this.

93288.「今 この場で もっとも重要と思われる人物……:
So the most important person here right now
is...

93290.「ダストン氏を 厳重に保護せよ！:
Mr. Duston must be put under strict
protection!

93292.「我々は いったん ドルワームに戻ります。 \n <cs_pchero>さんも:
We'll return to Dolworm. Please join us there,
<cs_pchero>. I'd like to discuss what's
to come with the King.

93293.「それじゃ <cs_pchero>！ \n ドルワーム水晶宮の玉座の間に すぐ来:
See you, <cs_pchero>! We'll be
in the throne room in Dolworm Crystal
Palace.

93294.「ムキャーッ！ モキィーッ！！\n 今すぐ！ わしを！ ここから出すですッ！！:
Rrrrrghhh!! Rrrraaaaghhh!! Let me out of here!
Let me out of here right now!!

93296.「いいかげん あきらめて\n おとなしくしてください。: Please calm down and behave yourself.

93297.「敵の目的は わかりませんが\n 今のあなたは 重要人物として狙われる身。\n:
I don't know what our enemy is after, but you
are now an important target. Please try to be
a bit more mindful of the situation.

93298.「ひ…ひいいいい……。\n じゅ 重要とか 言わねえでくだせえッ……！！\n わ:
U....uuuuuurgh.... Don't call me "important"!!
I don't want to be useful at all!

93299.「はあ…………。 \n 何度聞いても あなたの価値観には \n おどろきを 禁じ:
*sigh*... No matter how many times I hear it,
I don't think I'll ever understand the way
you value things...

93301.「<pc> 来てくれて ありがとう。\n さわがしくて ごめんね？\n お父さん:
Thanks for coming, <pc>. Sorry
to bother you, but as you can see my dad's
a bit...

93302.「でも お父さんが 落ち着くまでは \n しばらく 私も ここにいるつもりだし\:
But I'll be staying here for a while until he
settles down. Don't worry about me, so go
and do what you need to.

93303.「私が 誘拐犯に投げた発信機は\n エルトナ大陸の世界樹の丘に あるそうね。\n:
That tracking device should be located at
Yggdrahill in Eltona. Here's hoping you can
get to the bottom of it!

93304.「ムキャーッ！ モキィーッ！！\n もう！ わしは！ こんな生活イヤなんですッ！:
RRRRGGHHH!!! GRAAAGHHH!!! I can't do this
anymore! I can't live like this!!

93306.「あなたも こりないですね……。\n いいかげんに してください……。: You're relentless... please just calm down...

93307.「多少の不自由があるとは言え \n これだけ 丁重に もてなされ……\n いった:
You're being treated with utmost hospitality
albeit some minor inconveniences... how
are you in a position to complain?

93308.「ひ…ひいいいい……。\n て 丁重とか 言わねえでくだせえッ……！！\n わし:
U.... urrrgh.... Please don't say things like
"hospitality"... I don't want to be treated
like that!!

93309.「とにかく…… もう二度と ドルボードを使って \n 逃げ出そうとなんて しない:
Anyways... don't you dare try using a Dolboard
to escape again. Got it?!

93311.「ああっ <pc>。来てくれたんだ。\n さわがしくて ごめんね？\n お父さん:
Ah, it's you. Sorry to bother you, but as you
can see my dad's
still a bit...

93312.「早く 事件が解決して\n お父さんが 自由になれるといいんだけど……。:
I hope we can get to the bottom of this so
we can let my dad free...

93313.「<pc>は 今も事件を追ってるんだよね？\n <pc>が 事件を解決して\n:
You're still doing that, right? I hope you do,
and peace can finally return to the world!

103851.「私としたことが 取り乱すとは とんだ失礼を。\n では 気を取り直して…… コ:
It was rude of me to become so distraught.
Let's get back on track. Ahem...

116709.「し…信じられないな。\n この人が チリ王女の育ての親だと言うのか！？:
I... I don't believe it. THIS is the man who
raised Princess Chiri?!

119099.<pc>は チリたちと共に\nダストンが 警護されているという\nドルワーム王立:
<pc> went with Chiri and co. to
the Director's room, where Duston was said
to be under heavy protection.
